description: This is a static HTML file for a web-based database visualizer interface, including embedded CSS styles and JavaScript for dynamic interactions such as loading databases, tables, and data, as well as UI controls like refresh buttons and expandable cells.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of databases from the server.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by reloading from server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing database entries and loading associated tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and renders data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying a data table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for table cell with handling for long text and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for detailed view.
